name: Tales of Khildural: The Lost Royal
name_original: Tales of Khildural: The Lost Royal
description:
This is a RPG made with RPG Maker MV. This is our first game and might have a lot of bugs.

Story is about a Prince Elmer whose Brother got kidnapped and you have to save him.

Our website: salmiakkigames.weebly.com

FOR FULLSCREEN AND BETTER QUALITY PRESS F4! Do not press alt + f4 or game will shut down! F4 button is located in the top line in your keyboard!
